Emerging growth company &#9744; If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section&#160;13(a) of the Exchange Act. &#9744; &#160; &#160; &#160; Item&#8201;5.07. Submission of Matters to a Vote of Security Holders. At the Annual Meeting of Stockholders of Alphabet Inc. (&#8220; Alphabet &#8221;) held on June&#160;7, 2024 (the &#8220; 2024 Annual Meetin g&#8221;), Alphabet&#8217;s stockholders voted on fourteen proposals as set forth below, all of which are described in detail in Alphabet&#8217;s definitive proxy statement on Form 14A filed with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission on April&#160;26, 2024 (the &#8220; 2024 Proxy Statement &#8221;). Holders of the shares of Class&#160;A common stock were entitled to one vote per share held as of the close of business on April&#160;9, 2024 (the &#8220; Record Date &#8221;) and holders of the shares of Class&#160;B common stock were entitled to ten votes per share held as of the Record Date. Holders of the shares of Class&#160;A common stock and holders of the shares of Class&#160;B common stock voted together as a single class on all matters (including the election of directors) submitted to a vote of stockholders at the 2024 Annual Meeting. The number of votes cast for and against and the number of abstentions and broker non-votes with respect to each matter voted upon are set forth below. 1. The individuals listed below were elected at the 2024 Annual Meeting to serve as directors of Alphabet until the next annual meeting of stockholders or until their respective successors have been duly elected and qualified: &#160; Director Nominee &#160;&#160; For &#160;&#160; Against &#160;&#160; Abstentions &#160;&#160; Broker Non-Votes Larry Page &#160;&#160; 12,400,507,912 &#160;&#160; 247,959,437 &#160;&#160; 3,988,926 &#160;&#160; 584,773,150 Sergey Brin &#160;&#160; 12,400,675,664 &#160;&#160; 247,747,348 &#160;&#160; 4,033,263 &#160;&#160; 584,773,150 Sundar Pichai &#160;&#160; 12,463,917,269 &#160;&#160; 183,878,409 &#160;&#160; 4,660,597 &#160;&#160; 584,773,150 John L. The ratification of the appointment of Ernst&#160;&amp; Young LLP as Alphabet&#8217;s independent registered public accounting firm for the fiscal year ending December&#160;31, 2024 was approved.
